meanings.definition: Responsible for shedding blood; guilty of murder or bloodshed.
meanings.sent1: The bloodguilty criminal was sentenced to life in prison.
meanings.sent2: The jury found the bloodguilty man guilty of the crime.
meanings.sent3: The bloodguilty pirate had a parrot as a sidekick.
meanings.sent4: The bloodguilty act left a permanent stain on his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The bloodguilty deed haunted him in his dreams.

meanings.definition: Incurring guilt for causing harm or death to another person.
meanings.sent1: The bloodguilty driver felt immense remorse after the accident.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't shake off the feeling of being bloodguilty for the mistake.
meanings.sent3: The bloodguilty chef accidentally burned the souffle.
meanings.sent4: His bloodguilty actions weighed heavily on his soul.
meanings.sent5: The bloodguilty nurse made a grave error during surgery.
